mapper.update:
update blog_user t
t.unabletime = date_add(sysdate(), interval #{unableDay} day),
t.enable = #{enable},
t.reason = #{reason},
t.reason = "", t.unabletime = null,
t.lastlogip = #{logIp},
t.lastlogtime = sysdate(),
t.password = #{newPassword},
and t.loginid = #{loginId}
and t.password = #{password}
